class.name: SymbolInput
class.documentation: Here comes the description of the Symbol Plotting action

parameter.name: symbol_input_x_position
parameter.documentation: array containing x positions for symbol plotting. values may be geographic, paper or graph units depending on the value set in symbol_position_type

parameter.name: symbol_input_y_position
parameter.documentation: array containing y positions for symbol plotting. values may be geographic, paper or graph units depending on the value set in symbol_position_type

parameter.name: symbol_input_wind_speed
parameter.documentation: array containing wind speed for wind plotting. values may be geographic, paper or graph units depending on the value set in symbol_position_type

parameter.name: symbol_input_wind_direction
parameter.documentation: array containing wind direction for wind plotting. values may be geographic, paper or graph units depending on the value set in symbol_position_type

parameter.name: symbol_input_number_list
parameter.documentation: Array containing REAL VALUES. The value in a particular element of the array is plotted at the position defined by the corresponding elements of SYMBOL_INPUT_X_POSITION and SYMBOL_INPUT_Y_POSITION. This parameter may also be used with TEXT and MARKER plotting in TABLE mode

parameter.name: symbol_position_mode
parameter.documentation: Defines the input position data, valid values: GEOGRAPHIC, PAPER and GRAPH
